text: Agar ʙa hangomi haç talaʙ kuned rūziero az Parvardigoraton ʙo foida ʙurdan az savdo dar ajjomi haç, gunahgor naşudaed va cun ʙa'di guruʙi oftoʙ az Arafot ʙozgaştaed, Allohro dar Maş'arulharom ʙo tasʙehu takʙir va du'o jod kuned, ki şumoro ʙa rohi rost hidojat farmud, haroina peş az in az on gumrohon ʙuded, haqro namedonisted
